name: The Nameless Bonus Content
description:
Welcome to The Nameless Bonus Content!

This special "game" was created for the first anniversary of The Nameless, and is meant to be used as a hub for all of the extra writing that is published on tumblr, compiled into one convenient location! These are meant to be non-canon one shots based on a variety of prompts, and are generally aimed towards romantic situations with the four romance options of the original game, with some back story drabbles as well. As more one-shots are completed, this hub will be updated.

Warnings: The Nameless is currently 16+, and will contain depictions of violence and light gore, strong language, and eventually optional 18+ sexual content. 

There may be some drabbles that have content meant for 18+ audiences, which will have an additional check to confirm that you are 18+. This is done via honesty policy, so PLEASE DO NOT PROCEED TO THOSE ONE SHOTS if you are under 18.

Thank you so much for your support, and hope you enjoy!

~Parker Lyn

Background Image: Unsplash (Pawel Nolbert)
